...Saddam Hussein would favor peace a friendship among Iraqis after being condemned to death by hanging? It appears the idiot has finally figured out he's in deep doodoo...the Iraqi people do not fear him anymore.

...Saddam Hussein would favor peace a friendship among Iraqis after being condemned to death by hanging? It appears the idiot has finally figured out he's in deep doodoo...the Iraqi people do not fear him anymore.

 
 Why should they? He was benevolent when compared their current theocracy, which is far more corrupt than Saddam ever dreamed of being and supported by 150,000 US troops who call in air power if anyone disagrees with the new government. We traded one group of thugs for our own thugs.

Hardly benevolent, ask Kurds and others.
 
 However the whole setup is a case of pot calling kettle black.

Hardly benevolent, ask Kurds and others.

 I went and asked the Kurds, and they said that Turkey and Iran are killing their people still. They say that we need to invade those countries on the double. They would prefer that we take out Turkey first since they have killed more Kurds than Iran. Also the Kurds would like their own country.
The appeal of a nationalist who sees his nation fall apart to sectarian strife is my take on it.
